archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: CIMgen/CIMpy/CIM++
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: CIMgen is a template engine based tool for code generation from the CIM / CGMES data model for several programming languages. CIMpy and CIM++ are the generated python and C++ libraries. https://github.com/sogno-platform/cimgen https://github.com/sogno-platform/cimpy https://github.com/sogno-platform/libcimpp
